beer.beer_description:
What you hold in your hand is a small token of our
appreciation for voting our Status Quo Pale Ale the
Number 1 beer in the country 3 years in a row.
We humbly present Status IPA, the Triple dry hopped
IPA version of Status Quo.
Ok, it might not be the most original celebration but
it’s a Mountain Culture style celebration.
Discussions on what beer we’d brew to celebrate started
on the afternoon of the Countdown soon after the
confetti cannons fired. The first suggestion was ‘Status
Trio’ a 15.6% version of our beloved hazy pale ale and it
certainly won the popular vote at the time! Luckily, the
voice of reason that is our brewers and accounts team
was able to be heard. Their lectures touched on why our
house yeast wouldn’t be able to hit 15.6% and how the
excise alone would bankrupt us so we decided to brew
a triple dry hopped IPA version of Status.
Thank you again and here’s to the 4-peat!

items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 270 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 55!

user.bio: SF Giants, 49ers, SJ Sharks, GS Warriors and Valkyries! Dogs, Cars, Guns, BBQ, Bourbon & Cigars!
I usually give in to beer pressure.
Work less, play more, drink better beer
South of South Austin.  Boat rocker for life. Hey, yo....
Back home sampling all the hazys and occasionally something else!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 210 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 43!

items.checkin_comment: It’s the perfect beer!! I hope you make it every year

That's 35 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 485 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 98. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
